description: This header file defines the ContextUtils class, which provides static methods for converting between different context types used in the application, such as AppNotificationContext, GatewayContext, and provider contexts. It facilitates context translation across various components within the application.

classes.name: ContextUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to convert context objects between different application interfaces, simplifying context management and interoperability.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertNotificationToAppGatewayContext(const Exchange::IAppNotifications::AppNotificationContext & notificationsContext)
methods.description: Converts an AppNotificationContext object into a GatewayContext object.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertNotificationToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::IAppNotifications::AppNotificationContext & notificationsContext)
methods.description: Converts an AppNotificationContext object into a GatewayContext object suitable for launch delegate purposes.

methods.name: Exchange::IAppNotifications::AppNotificationContext ConvertAppGatewayToNotificationContext(const Exchange::GatewayContext & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts an AppGateway context into an AppNotificationContext, adding an origin string.

methods.name: Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context ConvertAppGatewayToProviderContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts an AppGateway context into an App2AppProvider context, with origin.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertProviderToAppGatewayContext(const Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & context)
methods.description: Converts an App2AppProvider context into a GatewayContext.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertProviderToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & context)
methods.description: Converts an App2AppProvider context into a GatewayContext for launch delegate.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertGatewayToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::GatewayContext & context)
methods.description: Converts a GatewayContext into a context suitable for a launch delegate.

methods.name: bool IsOriginGateway(const string & origin)
methods.description: Checks if the provided origin string matches the APP_GATEWAY_CALLSIGN, indicating if it is a gateway origin.

methods.name: Exchange::GatewayContext ToGatewayContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & appGatewayContext)
methods.description: Converts an IAppGateway::Context object into a GatewayContext.

methods.name: Exchange::IAppNotifications::AppNotificationContext ConvertAppGatewayToNotificationContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Overloaded method converting an IAppGateway::Context into an AppNotificationContext, with origin.

methods.name: Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context ConvertAppGatewayToProviderContext(const Exchange::GatewayContext & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Overloaded method converting an IAppGateway::Context into an App2AppProvider::Context, with origin.
